scripts.start: npm run clear-wiki && npm run empty-log && wiki-builder
scripts.local-setup: npm run uninstall-packages && node local.js && npm run preinstall
scripts.uninstall-packages: npm uninstall wiki-builder --save && npm uninstall wiki-builder-plugin-test --save
scripts.install-packages: npm install wiki-builder -save && npm install wiki-builder-plugin-test --save
scripts.npm-setup: node npm.js && npm run uninstall-packages && npm run install-packages && npm install
scripts.pre-commit: npm run npm-setup && npm run -s latest-version-text && npm run -s sugestion-text
scripts.latest-version-text: echo 'The latest version of this package is: ' && npm show wiki-builder-plugin-test version
scripts.sugestion-text:
echo '
Please check the version number in the package.json.
'
